course_description: Independent, faculty-mentored research and writing, with major writing assignment(s) accounting for at least 60% of the grade. Prerequisite: permission of instructor; may not receive credit for NBB 497WR and 495BW under the direction of the same faculty mentor.
sections: Class Nbr: 1443, Section #: 1, Type: SUP, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: P. Lennard, Status: Open
